name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

name: Introduction to Web Development
description: Basic principles and concepts of web development.

name: HTML and CSS Fundamentals
description: Understanding the fundamentals of HTML and CSS for web design.

name: JavaScript Programming
description: Introduction to JavaScript and its role in web development.

name: Front-End Development
description: Creating user interfaces and interactive web applications.

name: Back-End Development
description: Server-side scripting, databases, and server technologies.

name: Responsive Design and Mobile Development
description: Adapting web applications for different screen sizes and devices.

name: Web Security and Authentication
description: Principles of web security and user authentication.

name: APIs and Web Services
description: Building and consuming APIs for web applications.

name: Version Control and Deployment
description: Managing code with version control systems and deploying web apps.

name: Web Development Trends and Future Directions
description: Exploring emerging trends and technologies in web development.

name: Introduction to Fintech and Finance
description: Overview of the fintech industry and financial markets.

name: Cryptocurrency and Blockchain Technology
description: Understanding cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology.

name: Investment Strategies
description: Techniques for effective investment in financial markets.

name: Risk Management and Financial Derivatives
description: Managing financial risks and derivatives in finance.

name: Payment Systems and Digital Wallets
description: Exploring payment systems and digital wallet technologies.

name: Regulatory Compliance in Fintech
description: Complying with regulations and laws in the fintech industry.

name: Algorithmic Trading
description: Developing algorithms for automated trading strategies.

name: Crowdfunding and Peer-to-Peer Lending
description: Understanding crowdfunding and P2P lending platforms.

name: Financial Data Analysis and Visualization
description: Analyzing financial data and creating visualizations.

name: Future Trends in Fintech and Financial Markets
description: Examining upcoming trends and innovations in fintech and finance.

name: Introduction to Databases and SQL
description: Basics of databases, SQL, and their importance in computing.

name: Database Design Principles
description: Designing efficient and normalized databases.

name: SQL Querying and Data Manipulation
description: Writing SQL queries for data retrieval and modification.

name: Database Management Systems (DBMS)
description: Exploring different DBMS and their features.

name: Relational Diagrams and Entity-Relationship Modeling
description: Creating entity-relationship diagrams for database design.

name: Database Normalization and Optimization
description: Normalizing databases and optimizing their performance.

name: Indexing and Query Optimization
description: Improving query performance through indexing.

name: Transactions and Concurrency Control
description: Managing transactions and ensuring data consistency.

name: NoSQL Databases and Alternative Data Models
description: Introduction to NoSQL databases and non-relational data models.
